roleset.name: create

roles.note: This usage is extremely rare, if it exists at all. Given that there is now a separate roleset for 'making', all such instances should appear under that lemma.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: He plays an active role in policy making.

roleset.note: Added due to expansion of Nombank. Comparison to 'make.01'. VN class build-26.1-1. Framed by Katie.

roleset.name: build, structure

example.name: args 1&2
example.text: Scientists have suspected there must be something different about the genetic make - up of diabetics who develop complications ;

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on more-nouns, make_up-v.07. Corresponds to VNcls build-26.1.

roleset.name: renovate

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: She professionally and diligently executed her make over of my home through the use of additional furnishings and accessories which she provided.

example.name: Oooh La La!
example.text: August was especially special because of two things: First, Clinton Street would get her make-over of fresh tar and pea gravel in early August (maybe late July).
example.arg: of fresh tar and pea gravel

example.name: another args1 and 2
example.text: The bride to be had a 5 star service and she loved her make-over of sultry orange russet tones to complement her skin tone.
example.arg: of sultry orange russet tones to complement her skin tone

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on more-nouns. No corresponding VNcls.
